https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/resea: ISEE is seeking a full-time Senior Research Scientist - Prediction to join our team. The ideal candidate has 5+ years of relevant experience in behavior or trajectory prediction, computer vision, motion planning, machine learning, or related areas.Role responsibilities include: Architect and build pipelines for training and evaluating models on real driving data Develop and evaluate behavior/trajectory/intent prediction models Optimize prediction performance for real-time processing Collaborate with and mentor junior engineers Engage in cross-functional collaborations with perception and motion planning teamsQualifications: Advanced degree in Computer Science, Robotics, or related field Strong knowledge and experience in: pedestrian or vehicle behavior/trajectory prediction, intent prediction, generative modeling, sequence modeling, computer vision, machine learning, robotics Experience in deploying deep learning models at scale on real-world data in at least one of these deep learning frameworks: PyTorch, Tensorflow, Jax Strong C++ and/or Python skillsPreferred: Experience collaborating cross-functionally with perception and planning teams Passionate about self-driving vehicles and real-world robotic solutions Strong presentation and communication skills Publication record in top-tier robotics, machine learning, or computer vision conferences At least 3+ years industrial experience in developing Computer Vision/Deep learning algorithms in real-world scenarios Robotics/autonomous experience is a plus
